item.title: Johnson & Johnson To Separate Its Orthopedic Business
item.description: The company said that it will explore multiple paths to separate the business and is targeting a completion in 18 to 24 months.

item.title: Market Wrap: Nifty Ends Below 25,150 Amid Volatility, All Sectors End In The Red
item.description: While Tech Mahindra rose ahead of earnings, Tata Motors adjusted sharply post demerger.
